articles.title: India reports strikes on military bases, Pakistan denies any role - BBC
articles.description: India has accused Pakistan of attacking three military bases, a claim which has been denied by Islamabad.
articles.content:
Pakistani security officials inspect the site of an alleged Indian drone strike in Karachi
India has accused Pakistan of attacking three of its military bases with drones and missiles, a claim which… [+4705 chars]
